^LOL..  Kitten, Mp4 and mkv are much better for quality. Much better than the blockyness and pixelation that plagues AVI. Better quality and smaller filesize:)

Very, very disturbing how many people need handholding to play MP4 files. 
I mean come on, talk about a lazy generation. People have access to ANY piece of information they want through the internet, yet they decide to whine and bitch in the comments, screaming they want AVI back because they can't spend 5 minutes learning how to play MP4 files. Such a shame really.

@spifkitten99: no, YOU are bullshit. Nobody is forcing you to download this version. Why are people so technologically challenged?
I fail to see the problem with mp4 files. Just download the latest version of vlc media player. It plays everything.
what's wrong with mp4 files? vlc media player plays everything. No need for any codecs either

Not everyone watches these files on their computer. Some of us have media player devices hooked up to our TVs where we copy files over to them and sit down and watch them comfortably on our couches.

The problem is that many media players (such as the one I own) do NOT support MP4 or MKV, so it's a bit of a pain in the ass to convert them to AVI/MPEG each and every single time.

But I don't complain because hey - it's free.

But still, MKV is an unforgivable piece of shit codec to use. Virtually NO media players out there support it.

Don't like mp4's? Don't fucking d/l it.

Why do all these whiners keep complaining about the video file type?! Just download it, watch it on VLC or GOM, and stfu!!

Thank you eztv.

First of all, a big thanks to ezTV as always and please dont think Im being ungrateful as you've given me hours of entertainment.

But to all those on here on their high horse complaining that those who dont like mp4's are "technologically challenged" or crap like that, no. The reason we like avi is because it is versatile, I can play it on any TV or DVD player in the house just by copying it to a flashdrive. mp4 might be fine for those who like to watch shows hunched in front of a PC monitor or who lug their laptop around, but for the rest of us it is a pain in the ass.
